goal.en: “This course is focus on adaptive systems that includes fundamental knowledge, control design and application. The course has three goals : (1) understand how to estimate the system‘s unknown parameters; (2) understand how to design the system‘s controller; (3) understand how to do the system‘s analysis.“
goal.ch: 此課程內容包含適應性系統之介紹、控制器設計與應用。主要為針對未知參數的線性與非線性系統，給予估測其未知參數，並更進一步分析與設計適用系統之控制器。藉由此課程之學習後，同學們將可處理大部分具有未知參數及不確定性之系統，並理解如何給予該系統適當的控制設計與效能分析。

content.en:
1.fundamental knowledge
2.Identification of system parameters
3.Adaptive control for linear systems
4.Adaptive control for nonlinear systems
5.Adaptive combined neural network control
6.Adaptive combined sliding mode control
content.ch:
1.基本知識之介紹
2.系統參數之鑑別
3.線性系統之適應控制
4.非線性系統之適應控制
5.適應性類神經網路控制
6.適應性順滑模式控制

textbook.en: “P. A. Ioannou ＆ J. Sun, Robust Adaptive Control, Prentice-Hall, Upper Saddle River, NJ, 1996.“
textbook.ch: “P. A. Ioannou ＆ J. Sun, Robust Adaptive Control, Prentice-Hall, Upper Saddle River, NJ, 1996.“
